compression.comment_ols: Golden ratio φ — compress branch when size > φ × system average
compression.comment_eligibility: Compression eligibility is physics-derived at runtime — node must have current_relevance < retrieval_threshold. No hardcoded count.

decay.comment_lambda: Ebbinghaus forgetting curve rate — 0.5 empirically grounded
decay.comment_backbone: Backbone nodes are permanent — zero decay ever

thresholds.comment: Signal Detection Theory — threshold = mean_sim + log(β) × std_sim. β is cost asymmetry: cost(false_positive) / cost(false_negative)

dedup.comment: False alarm (losing distinct info) 3x worse than miss (mild bloat)

retrieval.comment: Miss (lost context) 3x worse than false alarm (mild noise)

consensus.comment: False alarm (bad permanent memory) 5x worse than miss (slow backbone growth)

bootstrap.comment: Used when active node count below min_corpus_size — cold start fallback

consensus.comment: Multiplier applied to consensus threshold per branch stakes level
consensus.comment_quorum: v0.5 — canonicalize quorum_requires into physics block alongside λ, φ, β derivations. R0 as single source of truth for all principled constants.

injection.comment_top_n: v0.5 — revisit when subject+predicate summary grouping lands. Count-based cap becomes less meaningful when injecting summaries not raw nodes.
injection.comment_budget: v0.5 — revisit alongside top_n when summary injection lands.

archival.comment_cold: v0.5 — replace with physics-derived cold threshold consistent with retrieval drop-off gate. Branch is cold when its retrieval score sinks below retrieval_threshold.

agents.comment: Consensus by convergent signal strength, not head count. Emergent from distribution.

predicates.comment: Locked predicate vocabulary v1. Unknown predicates are logged not rejected. Free-text fallback uses subject=null, predicate=knows, full string as object.

unknown_predicates.comment: Unknown predicate logged on every unrecognized write. When count reaches promotion_threshold, surfaces as candidate for human review and vocabulary promotion.
